findings.title: Unprotected Transfer Function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have sufficient access control, allowing non-whitelisted wallets to interact with the smart contract.

findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential security vulnerability in approve function

findings.title: _transfer
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in internal _transfer function.

findings.title: _beforeTokenTransfer
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in internal function _beforeTokenTransfer.

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized actions.

findings.title: Mint Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The mint function has a vulnerability marked with 🛑 symbol.

findings.title: _burn
findings.description: Potential burn vulnerability in AngryFloki contract's _burn function.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap functions.

findings.title: Skim Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in the skim function.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The 'sync' function is not protected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize state variables.
